data: `damage` is an Event Response that applies damage to a target.

data.Name: amount
data.Description: The amount of damage to deal.

data.Name: mob_amount
data.Description: The amount of damage to deal if held by a mob.

data.Name: [target](../../../EntityReference/Examples/FilterList.md)
data.Description: The target context to execute against.

data.Name: [type](../../../EntityReference/Examples/Filters/has_damage.md#list-of-damage-types)
data.Description: The type of damage to deal.
